modules.name: simplex & hold
modules.description: sample & hold module using internal simplex noise source

modules.name: polyrand
modules.description: output a random channel of a poly input with a trigger

modules.name: noize
modules.description: random noise generator with duration parameter and 0-10V cv input

modules.name: steps
modules.description: a simple 8 step sequencer with randomize trigger and eoc output

modules.name: fibb
modules.description: a clock divider based on the fibonacci sequence

modules.name: oct sclr
modules.description: scales voltage to specified octave range

modules.name: shift
modules.description: an 8-step shift register with probability params for each step

modules.name: math
modules.description: applies various math operations on two inputs, clamped to +/-10V

modules.name: logic
modules.description: perform logical operations on two inputs

modules.name: probably not
modules.description: mute a signal on trigger, based on probability

modules.name: polyplay
modules.description: load and play a sample polyphonically
